name: Barista Statement
description:
Barista Statement by nilson carroll

- take everyone's orders on the river lethe  - don't mess up. you literally have one chance - take orders from dynamic npcs (just like irl)

maybe like a ten (10) minute barista puzzle (?)
designed after thecatamites' indivisible elements of games

Made for Coffee Jam 2018


Amount of coffee consumed: five (5) cups of coffee
"Play By Your Own Runes"
